chapters.title: Prologue:  Embers Falling on Dry Grass
chapters.info:
Mistress of Novices,
      p. 65â€”The
      Aes Sedai who is in charge of training novices and Accepted in the White
      Tower.  The post was held by Sheriam Bayanar of
      the Blue Ajah until a coup that deposed
      Siuan Sanche
      chased her out of the Tower.  The post is now held by
      Silviana Brehon in Tar Valon and
      Tiana Noselle among the Aes Sedai who fled to
      Salidar.  Another Mistress of Novices of the past was
      Seraille Bagand, who
      later became the Amyrlin Seat.
      See also
      Bayanar, Sheriam;
      Brehon, Silviana;
      Noselle, Tiana.
